attributes.action: The Government to encourage or legislate that vehicle manufacturers fit as standard, computer trip displays that show fuel consumption, such as presently fitted to higher ‘spec’ models or prestige vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government to encourage or legislate that vehicle manufacturers fit as standard, computer trip displays that show fuel consumption, such as presently fitted to higher ‘spec’ models or prestige vehicles. Drivers could see how their driving behaviour relates to fuel consumption and the damage they cause to environment. It may make them use their vehicle in a more environmentally friendly way by a better standard of driving and avoiding unnecessary journeys.
